title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing user-facing web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and ensuring optimal user experience.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in Frontend Development
Proficiency in React, Vue.js, or Angular
Strong knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
Experience with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Join our creative team as a UX/UI Designer where you'll create intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences. You'll work closely with product managers and developers to bring ideas to life.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe Creative Suite

title: Product Manager
description: We're seeking a strategic Product Manager to drive product development and growth. You'll define product roadmaps, work with cross-functional teams, and ensure we're building products our customers love.

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our data science team to extract insights from complex datasets and drive business decisions. You'll work on machine learning models, statistical analysis, and data visualization projects.
requirements: Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
3+ years of experience in data science or analytics
Proficiency in Python, R, and SQL

title: Backend Developer
description: We're looking for a skilled Backend Developer to build and maintain scalable server-side applications. You'll work with cloud technologies and microservices architecture.
requirements: Proficiency in Node.js, Python, or Java
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Knowledge of database design and optimization

title: Marketing Specialist
description: Join our marketing team to develop and execute marketing campaigns that drive growth and engagement. You'll work across digital channels and help build our brand presence.
requirements: Knowledge of SEO and content marketing
